summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Fourth Avenue Northeast from East 65th Street to East Greenlake Boulevard et al, in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing under Ordinance No 15947, creating Local Improvement District No. 1484 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
